titleStmt.title: The amorous prince, or, The curious husband a comedy / by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A27279 of text R14102 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing B1718). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 190 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 44 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: The amorous prince, or, The curious husband a comedy / by Mrs. A. Behn.

Davenport, Robert, fl. 1623. City night-cap.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Thomas Dring,

notesStmt.note: "Built on the novel of the Curious impertinent, and on Davenport's City night-cap."--Baker, Biog. Dram. cf. also Works of A. Behn, ed. by M. Summers, v. 4.
